name: Rowan
description:
<<<<< REQUIRES OCULUS QUEST  >>>>>

You follow the story of Rowan, a teenage girl, lost in the middle of a forest, trying to piece together what has happened to herself. 

Scared, yet resourceful, you guide her through the darkness, battling forest creatures .... but there in the distance a more malevolent force is observing you, planning and waiting. 

She must find a way to escape, to figure out their motives...

Rowan is a ghost story with the emphasis on atmosphere and survival and incorporating a mixture of FPS and puzzle solving.

Part 1 of Rowan is now released. 

Please leave comments after playing. We would greatly appreciate any feedback on gameplay, bugs or improvement suggestions.
